Noah Anutta

Empowering Brands Through Artful Web Development

"when you make something no one hates,
no one loves it."

-Tibor Kalman

Just Make Something

I first discovered Tibor Kalman during my junior year at university, right after I switched my major from Computer Systems Engineering to Graphic Information Technology. His work captivated me, but it was one particular quote that truly resonated with me.

For me, art and design isn't about following the rules or using an outline. We should all strive to create and embrace our own image. Whether it's what we write, illustrate, sing, or even code — our greatest strength is embracing our individuality.

About Me

Hi, I'm a web developer in Arizona with a focus on creating dynamic e-commerce sites using the Shopify ecosystem.

My education in Computer Science, Web Development, and Graphic Design at ASU Polytechnic allows me to blend technical expertise with creative design. My work integrates this technical proficiency with a strong design sensibility, ensuring that each project not only meets but exceeds expectations.

Outside of my professional life, I'm involved in music, photography, and videography. This, in turn, informs my creative approach to web design.
